trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_000<tab>Welcome, my friend, to Clearmelt! Our warm and soothing waters welcome all travelers seeking to soothe their weary bones and wash away the worries of the road. Should you have any questions about our baths, you need but say the word.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_010<tab>While I am as relieved as any that night has returned to the realm, it has presented difficulties as well. Why, it is all I can do to keep from slipping and falling into the water when making the rounds in the dark. I advise you to watch your footing as well.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_030<tab>Welcome, friend. Did you, perchance, suffer a wound in the battle against the sin eaters? Many brave souls like yourself have come here to Clearmelt to partake in our healing waters. You are welcome to soak for as long as you wish.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_040<tab>And the endless day has returned. Though it makes it easier for me to watch over the baths, I must say I miss gazing up at the stars in the sky. But enough of my grumblings─what may I do for you today?

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_050<tab>Welcome to Clearmelt! Our soothing waters are open to all travelers, night and day. If you've never taken a soak in the baths while gazing up at the brilliant night sky, you really must try it sometime. I can promise you it will heal both body and soul.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_200<tab>I am in charge of watching over the baths and keeping our visitors safe. This involves driving off the occasional fiend, as well as waking up bathers who have fallen asleep in sheer bliss before they manage to drown themselves.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_201<tab>We even get the occasional stray sin eater, and I don't have to tell you they're not here for a relaxing soak. I must remain ever vigilant, that those under my watch are not struck down when they are at their most defenseless.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_210<tab>Though the horrors brought upon us by the Flood of Light have passed, the worries, aches, and pains we face in our daily lives will never fade away entirely. As long as people want for the succor of our waters, I will watch over the springs and keep them safe.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_400<tab>This is Clearmelt. Before the Flood, it was home to an inn famed throughout the land for the healing properties of its hot springs. Nowadays, it serves as a treatment facility for the Crystarium guard and travelers seeking to soothe their battered bodies and weary hearts.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_402<tab>While there are hot spring baths in the city as well, I can assure you that the waters here are another thing entirely. The pristine meltwater that flows down from the surrounding snow-capped peaks is heated underground, bursting through to the surface in gushing founts.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_403<tab>Our baths are known to have a wide variety of healing properties. Soothing wounds, loosening joints, revitalizing the skin─these are but a few of the benefits you will enjoy. Needless to say, it's also a wonderful place to relax and forget your worries for a moment.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_410<tab>The other night, as I was soaking in the baths and gazing up at the starry skies, a thought came to me. Much as night has returned to our realm, perhaps ordinary life will once again return to the ruins of Lakeland.

TEXT_REGNOR4CLEARMELT_00587_KEEBOSTT_000_411<tab>Perhaps one day Clearmelt will once again thrive and flourish as an inn, and welcome weary travelers from all corners of the realm. A man can dream, can he not?
